subject: College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The University of Miami president, Donna Shalala, ended speculation Monday that the Hurricanes’ brawl with Florida International Saturday night might cost Coach Larry Coker his job before the season’s end.
snippet: The University of Miami president, Donna Shalala, ended speculation Monday that the Hurricanes’ brawl with Florida International Saturday night might cost Coach Larry Coker his job before the season’s end.
